head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MEAD, DAVID FRANCIS

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MEAD, DAVID FRANCIS

block.p: MEAD-David Francis. Suddenly, in New York on August 22, 2000. Gifted composer and accomplished musician, founder of N.Y.C. based jingle house, MEAD MUSIC MAKERS. Adored son of Marian (Co. Laois, Ireland) and the late Walter. Beloved brother of John (and Wendy), Cecily (and Richard Motherway), and Andrea. Loving friend to Deirdre. Devoted uncle to Richard, Alicia and Daniel McDonald, Francesca and Phoebe Flynn, and Alexis and Emily Mead. Dear great uncle, nephew and friend. Services at Old Saint Patrick's Cathedral (Mott Street), Wednesday, August 30th, 4PM.
